name: Sweet and Sour Chickpeas Peppers Broccoli
description: Sweet and Sour Chickpeas, Peppers, and Broccoli. Easy Weeknight One Pot Protein filled Meal. Serve with cooked rice/grains. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe

video.name: Sweet and Sour Chickpeas Broccoli & Peppers - VeganRicha.com
video.description:
Chickpeas and Veggies in Sweet and Sour Sauce
Full Recipe here ➡️ http://www.veganricha.com/2015/12/sweet-and-sour-chickpeas-peppers-broccoli.html

Sweet and Sour Chickpeas Peppers and Broccoli. 1 Pot Weeknight Protein Meal. Serve over rice, grains or noodles. Chickpeas and veggies cooked in Easy From Scratch Sweet and Sour Sauce. Vegan Gluten-free Nut-free Recipe

#vegan #veganism #easyveganrecipes  #veganrecipes #veganricha #cooking

Music by Mark Brigantti - Oranges.

recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup sugar (I use 2 tbsp sugar and 2 or more tbsp coconut sugar)
2 tsp soy sauce (use certified gluten-free tamari to make gf)
1/2  large red bell pepper ( thinly sliced)
a generous dash of salt (black pepper, cayenne)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the sauce ingredients in a bowl and set aside. You can also add them directly to the pan at step 5.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all the sauce ingredients in a bowl and set aside. You can also add them directly to the pan at step 5.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil over medium high heat in a large skillet. Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes or until translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil over medium high heat in a large skillet. Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes or until translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the peppers and mix in. Cover and cook for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the peppers and mix in. Cover and cook for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the broccoli and mix in. Cover and cook for 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the broccoli and mix in. Cover and cook for 1 minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chickpeas, sauce ingredients, a generous dash of salt, black pepper and cayenne. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chickpeas, sauce ingredients, a generous dash of salt, black pepper and cayenne. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste the sauce carefully and adjust to preference. Add more sour, sugar or salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste the sauce carefully and adjust to preference. Add more sour, sugar or salt.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix cornstarch in room temperature water and add the mixture to the pan. Mix in. Cover and cook for 2 to 3 minutes until the sauce thickens.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix cornstarch in room temperature water and add the mixture to the pan. Mix in. Cover and cook for 2 to 3 minutes until the sauce thickens.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with sesame seeds, red pepper flakes and scallions and serve with cooked rice or grains of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with sesame seeds, red pepper flakes and scallions and serve with cooked rice or grains of choice.
